flavorText: Until more information could be gleaned about Niv-Mizzet's intentions, Lazav took every opportunity to stall his experiments.

foreignData.flavorText: Bis über Niv-Mizzets Absichten weitere Informationen zu erhalten waren, ergriff Lazav jede Gelegenheit, dessen Experimente aufzuhalten.
foreignData.name: Psychischer Schlag
foreignData.text: Neutralisiere einen Zauberspruch deiner Wahl. Sein Beherrscher legt die obersten zwei Karten seiner Bibliothek auf seinen Friedhof.

foreignData.flavorText: Hasta que pudiera recabar más información acerca de las intenciones de Niv-Mízzet, Lazav aprovechó toda oportunidad de retrasar sus experimentos.
foreignData.name: Ataque psíquico
foreignData.text: Contrarresta el hechizo objetivo. Su controlador pone las primeras dos cartas de su biblioteca en su cementerio.

foreignData.flavorText: N'ayant pas réussi à glaner plus d'informations sur les intentions de Niv-Mizzet, Lazav profita du moindre prétexte pour retarder ses expériences.
foreignData.name: Frappe psychique
foreignData.text: Contrecarrez le sort ciblé. Son contrôleur met les deux cartes du dessus de sa bibliothèque dans son cimetière.

foreignData.flavorText: Finché le intenzioni di Niv-Mizzet rimanevano oscure, Lazav cercava in ogni modo di ostacolare i suoi esperimenti.
foreignData.name: Colpo Psichico
foreignData.text: Neutralizza una magia bersaglio. Il suo controllore mette nel suo cimitero le prime due carte del suo grimorio.

foreignData.flavorText: ニヴ＝ミゼットの企みについてより多くの情報が集積できるまで、ラザーヴは彼の実験を遅らせるべく手を尽くした。
foreignData.name: 心理的打撃
foreignData.text: 呪文１つを対象とし、それを打ち消す。それのコントローラーは自分のライブラリーの一番上から２枚のカードを自分の墓地に置く。

foreignData.flavorText: 라자브는 니브-미젯의 의도를 파악할 수 있을 때까지 전력을 기울여 그의 실험을 지연시켰다.
foreignData.name: 초능력의 일격
foreignData.text: 주문 한 개를 목표로 정한다. 그 주문을 무효화한다. 그 주문의 조종자는 자신의 서고 맨 위의 카드 두 장을 자신의 무덤에 넣는다.

foreignData.flavorText: Até que se pudesse obter mais informações sobre as intenções de Niv-Mizzet, Lazav aproveitou todas as oportunidades para atrasar suas experiências.
foreignData.name: Golpe Psíquico
foreignData.text: Anule a mágica alvo. Seu controlador coloca os dois cards do topo do grimório dele no próprio cemitério.

foreignData.flavorText: Пытаясь разузнать, что задумал Нив-Миззет, Лазав тем временем делал все возможное, чтобы застопорить эксперименты дракона.
foreignData.name: Удар по Психике
foreignData.text: Отмените целевое заклинание. Контролирующий его игрок кладет две верхние карты своей библиотеки на свое кладбище.

foreignData.flavorText: 在搜集更多资讯来弄清尼米捷的企图之前，拉札夫用尽各种机会来拖延实验进度。
foreignData.name: 心灵打击
foreignData.text: 反击目标咒语。其操控者将其牌库顶的两张牌置入其坟墓场。

foreignData.flavorText: 在蒐集更多資訊來弄清尼米捷的企圖之前，拉札夫用盡各種機會來拖延實驗進度。
foreignData.name: 心靈打擊
foreignData.text: 反擊目標咒語。其操控者將其牌庫頂的兩張牌置入其墳墓場。

name: Psychic Strike
originalText: Counter target spell. Its controller puts the top two cards of his or her library into his or her graveyard.

rulings.text: If the target spell is an illegal target when Psychic Strike tries to resolve, Psychic Strike won’t resolve and none of its effects will happen. The target’s controller won’t put any cards from the top of their library into their graveyard.

You may target a spell that can’t be countered. When Psychic Strike resolves, the target spell will be unaffected, but its controller will still put the top two cards of their library into their graveyard.

text: Counter target spell. Its controller mills two cards.
